resources.string: A pretty pink, sparkly ribbon tied in a knot and attached to a hair pin.
Some people say that dungeons are to dark to wear those. And you say that those people aren't cool enough.
A tall-crowned, narrow-brimmed hat. It's usually associated with Puritans, but you don't have to be religious to wear it. For some reason it has nameplate, that says "Solomon".
It's a felt headdress in the shape of a truncated cone made of red felt, with a tassel attached to the top. And no, it doesn't make world 3-dimensional.
Sometimes you want to wash off all that monster blood and dirt and just feel cute and fluffy... Or at very least you can wear cute cat ears.
Is an accessory. Extravaganza it is, it is

Back in a day Pumpkin people were proud and prosperous nation. But after humans came everything ended up in ruins. And severed carved heads of long gone Pumpkin tribes serves as remainder of those terrible events.
